Title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
Writer: Ol Parker (screenplay by), Ol Parker (screen story by), John Madden (screen story by)
Actors: Dev Patel, Maggie Smith, Danny Mahoney, David Strathairn
Plot: As the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel has only a single remaining vacancy, posing a rooming predicament for two fresh arrivals, Sonny Kapoor (Dev Patel) pursues his expansionist dream of opening a second hotel.
